item.title: Star Shimmer Tale of the other Side of Defeat - Transcribed
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
I don't read. I'd rather my own ideas most of the time, so only out of necessity. Research. Even then I try to out hipster myself.  I like new trails.  And I love learning about the old ones from my friends. Everyone has their thing.  This girl is as much mine as my skateboard.  There's no choice.  Where she goes in time I follow along blindly, but the space isn't always the same. Some say this makes me too weird and "insane." It's not.  What's weird and insane is the PTSD i suffer every time they try to rid me of her (oh wait, this is just the prelude, shit.... time for me to skate 'crete or die....) PAGE 1 [lone jackl] This morning I woke up and you weren't there. I was alarmed to find my star shimmered dressed princess nowhere in site.  As I peeredd below my window to view whatever black dusted mess I stared into the sewer FOR her (didn't know at the time, though she was fashioning my jackl-self. a children's story character anti-hero who will fuck up shit for them beyond belief. mess with the kids is to mess with my contribution to evolution. fuck you pink izod ice cream eaters, fuck you) ....

He came out of nowhere  beaming flames out of my cigarette butt. Un-wavering, I continued to smoke.  Though no ash tray in sight.

Spit into the sewer drain I did. And always with that moment of hesitation. ... what if there's gas or some shit down there?  There wasnt but that creeper wouldn't fade. Stared him down till the glow was no more.  He tried his damndest to distract me with fear.  A noise here a noise there. I held my stare. Unwavering. Fuck You. Till the glow finally went away.  Then I blinked.  The glow was back. Tricky fucker was electric bugging the cells in my eye mucus, in efforts to pull the wool over my eyes.

[jackl talking to princess]

like that one time in 301 LG!!ON THAT sunny as fuck day girl. I love that day; I live that day. Setting up trains of electricly conduscive shit just for fun, then gnashing the whole fucking thing out the window to every electric cell on the planet.  Right before those fucking pigs who were actually space cowboys fucked us over....

uuuugggghhhh

[princess]

love is the law, jimmy. taught you that at Pine Lake kid!  Now you're the kid hahaha; i.e. you're older than me this time!

[jaemz and lg]

(2016 forgot why i wrote that, but just remembered, thanks keylime!)

PAGE 2

The showdown  in the courtyard Behind locked gates in the Danish Garden. Heyseuss showed up.  "That fucker's already killed you 2 and a half times.   You make the shit look easy now.  WWJD??   "personally, i'd bash his skull in to a bloody pulp.  Then I wouldn't have to bother with the ol' skull fuck desecration.   DUDE WWDWD!!   It's been a long time.  folks are kinda pissed. this dude ain't on either side but his own, and it fucks everyone's game.  Till the game jus' aint fun no mo'.   soooooooooooo CLINK! CLINK! the gate opens rapidly and someone's footsteps speed walk through the mail box and everyone's bike corridor.   lime green safety vest dashes out of the darkness stripped bare of previous barbwire. apparently this is old witch hat in these parts. It's gone, listen.

PAGE 3

[current time: write now (Copenhagen June 2016 hospital)] [jackl to princess] Good point girl.  That is probably why the smoking man started smoking.  That vape you had was tasty shit.  I’m a get me one o’ dose sum day soon.  Thanks for the advice back at 711.  The Manitou Organics ain’t a bad taste.   A good breadcrumb of space-time to remember, I was going that way (vape-way) and I bet it will glow green and be easy to see in the overall space-time continuum of this epoch (so many in this cell). [jackl] You see my reflexes are getting fast from avoiding to break my old man 43-year-old ass.  Sooooo I practice skating even the impossible. [princess] Gee, wonder who’s side that came from? [princess] Zlol [jackl to princess] Obvs, yours, duh.  Glad I found you.  Reflexes so quick, my old ass brain forgot what my body did (Also known as stoner ghost, the ghost controlling me when I’m stoned, or the ghost that haunts my house, or the ghost almighty lg. Haven’t figured out which one is doing it most, [princess] zlol). [jackl to princess] Your shimmering stem (current time, this pen, the bone she threw me once on a jog, and the bone, a pen, lost in copenhagen while writing this story) was in my duffle bag safe the whole time. Like I felt all night laughing with my friends, safe. Safe-haven. Skateparks I wish you were all hallowed ground.

PAGE 4

[jackl to princess] Soooooooooooo No wonder you’re like that huge gap away in age, in time this intersection? We get looks girl.  My own damn thoughts look (like 24/7) at us.  Creepers creep me the creep out.  But this is 100000000000000000 times different.  Go find some boyfriends.  Start a club and drain them too.  I’ll make sure to hang low key till I catch up.  Starting with losing you in my reflexes to the duffle bag last night, if I keep on the physiological biological psychological mathematical physics swiftness to make it all habit, then we should be good by next intersection. Teaching in the meantime of this time without poison apples is a cake walk. BTW you’d be perfect in a perfect and reasonable age range away if they didn’t take you after our split of 2004.

PAGE 5

[jackl to princess] I’m good at time.  Holding a kiss that long will be my pleasure.   Good building till I’m up to bat.  But look out girl.  I’m gonna rip so hard I’ll be younger than you.  And call you Mountain Lion, cuz Cougar is already cat-dog’s cat’s name.  Le Mew. [8th grade light girl angel] YOU AND THOSE DUDE… DUMB ASS JOKES RULZ!!! [jackl to 8th grade lg] Sooo who was that black stain dusted throughout the drain anyway?  Any relation to anyone in Paris in 2000? [8th grade lg to jackl] I think he was taking pictures of our picnic #2; our second picnic. [jackl to 8th grade lg] oh he’s dumb. I don’t even have anymore nitrous.  

PAGE 6

Anyway you’re back, so let’s wrap up this take. We’ve never written so soon after an event.  Then again, you’ve never been around this long.  I must’ve done something good to deserve this one girl.  Thank you. Don’t be a stranger for/ever again.  Let’s fuck shit up. We’re going to need more roses. Stone ones. Large and carved. Pool block marbled and starved of exclusivity.  Dbags need not enter the ground I skate for you.  Home Base. Ally Ally Auction Free. Is that how it goes? Duh, no you look it up!!

PAGE 7

[jackl] I’m hungry. Hope I get paid. Can’t tell if the missing credit card is mischief or you teaching me a lesson again lg.  I was quite productive looking for you.  The place is spic and span like our Cabin In The Emerald City. [lg] Your thoughts were on point too oldie youngie. Zlol z/0/z (nice conscious deletions) [thank you girl but that date lookin one is all you sister] (nice conscious deletions) (and?) [jackl] ummmm ya, learned my lesson there sweetness and light.  Put on your star shimmer sparkle glitter neon white vapor light dress. “put on my dress, I’m going, out dancing” –pj Harvey pink wristband I got you and silver gloss lipstick (I’ll find some) today!  It sticks out extremely  

PAGE sk8creteordie

Well against that neon black hole patched up last night.  Karaoke some Blondie or some shit too.  Just like on the job, where you gave me the matching pen along with the little blister on your finger now.   [princess] Ha ha ha hah ahahaha it will remind you we’re never lost.  Just wandering and turning stones for baby crabs on the seaweed shore. [jackl] Yeah, with massive barnacles!

PAGE 8

[jackl] Well against a neon black sky.  Blindingly amazing and beautiful, and the perfect Honey Pot for gathering wannabe poser darkness of greed folks (deep forest green, where I grew up).  When I myself morph into a dolphin kid, I will dive down head first into Pine Lake, pet a few crawdads, reach elbow deep in the mud below, and find a deep forest green emerald for “THE” ring.

PAGE 9

[jackl] Not the one from Twin Peaks either. That would be too cliché. No, the one I’m looking for, you can’t even tell is there.  Perhaps hair line adjustable platinum. Silver some thin or some shit.  I’ll wait till someone throws some pair of matching earrings at me, and fashion it with my anger to into love for you.  You’re one unique ass ring.

PAGE 10

I woke up this afternoon, before the party, and you weren’t there.  I’d thought we were on the same page.  And this time I’d been waiting for your human side to be at my bed side tending my wounded eye, sg (wow, sg showed up in the Copenhagen hospital, and was an adorable young woman). Though your shape was needed somewhere else, I suppose.  Just didn’t expect the unexpected.  Was getting so used to having you around.  What I could’ve said?  What subtle hint could I have lead? I have led in my head now, though I’m sure my next dream will keep me stead to the rock of Gibralter.  As it’s made of Limestone, Ms Lime Green, Light Girl, Rainbow Light Girl, lifetime and beyond lover…. Now that I’ve found the closest match, whom I'll simply call Limestone.

PAGE 11

Never forgot you these past 12 years. I notice every Limestone subtle hint, a flash that could use tint.  As my eyes are not yet equipped to stare without being stripped to my bare naked self for full absorption. I've said this before and I'll say it again, you're beauty sprawls the universe to her safety and well being in spite of man. You float auras and you a soaras past through time and space everywhere since the invention of time, protecting tools like me. Actually, I've never said that. YOU ARE THE SHIT!

PAGE 12

I’VE BEEN MARCHING YOUR PATH FOR 12 YEARS SOLID, SO THAN YOU FOR AT LEAST SHOWING ONE OF YOUR REAL FACES.  CLOSEST TO THE ORIGINAL PRINCESS I MET IN THAT INSTITUTION. I don’t like institutions. Thank you for being there in times most needed, by those you are most heeded. You were Stephan pushing the army dude back from hitting me! I’ve thrown an invisible leash around your neck. It just hurt when I Pulled and you were gone… let me get out of this funk and into our new religion. (jka + ls) oooo kinda got a ring to it.  Will be hard and fun finding one anyway.

PAGE 13

And so I march on we’ll tell one last quick tale. My meds are kicking in, and I’m sure of you I’ll dream again. Jimmy’s new shoes were not a random act shoved into a noose. You led me there, took my hand. I thought you were at the green steepled church as we strolled through Copenhagen hand in hand. The church was beautiful, like everything else in this land (Denmark).  I sat in a corner, became jackl for the princess’ right hand.  Crept, crawled into a stand, and vibed the shit out of that 1st pink shirted man.  He was a fucking douche. Eating himself bland and too afraid to stand, and frightened of the princess’ left hand. ironically enough, the inside of that church was wiped white bare.  and i said to myself, "if this isn't a church for one of helena's raves, or just really a catholic church that it looks like from the outside, then i'm gonna be somewhat pissed." -jackl

PAGE 14

The princess’ left hand. Leaped and gawked and vibed and gone. My reward was a pair of Ecco black for walking the sand. …a man with a backpack, tryin’ to pick up the lady at hand.  I jumped in, and cock blocked his STAND. It was nothing, and once he vibed away, I gave back to the community by purchasing that siiiiick new pair of Ecco Black Leather shoes. For you I’ll wear those shoes… Walking FOR FUCKING EVER

item.title: Political projects?
item.dc:creator: magnus
item.content:encoded: Feeling left behind. The european stress theory. I fucking hate people. I'm an antisocial dickhead. When you 2 times in the same week get kicked out of the projectgroup, you just wanna be alone. When you then want to use your own ideas, and they then say, that it's their ideas, you get really pissed. I was really pissed in the first place, so I wanted to do shit alone for the rest of the day. Then of course, your teacher puts you in a new group for a new project. She told me to be more social. She didn't get the fact, at i wanted to work alone. I don't trust people the same way I used to do. People are taking cred for what I do. Imagine buying all the ingredients for a meal. You make your own recipe as well, and then you leave the kitchen for an hour, and someone else cooks the meal. Then they say they made it all. Then you tell them, you're gonna make the meal yourself, and they tell you, that you can't use that recipe, because they made it. That's what it feels like being left behind. Are they afraid, that you're gonna make a better meal, or are they just butthurt, because you left the kitchen? That's what every schoolday feels like. I'm so pissed off. -Magnus H. Dyhrfjeld.

item.title: thank you wells fargo dealer services
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
so my last "UP Adventure" led me to 80mph in a 60mph zone at midnight (I was going with the flow), speeding down I5 south through tacoma. i was cool in king county where seattle's finest reside, but not so much in pierce county (cough cough fife sucks cough cough) the cops got behind me, and i thought they were on the same page, giving me an escort again, like that slow speed chase in boise idaho back in 2009, when i got my ass handed to me, bloody face down in asphalt glass that made its way to my stomach (i spit it on a cop in jail through the small cell door slot where she was trying to pass me medication without an attorney or doctor present. i got 6 months in jail and 5 years felony probation for that. don't disrespect the law in jail in idaho. they will pursue your ass illegally and make it look legal while you are mentally gravely disabled in court). they weren't as soon as i realized that, i proceeded to pull the fuck over when i saw a bunch of them throw one of those snake spike things in the road, i knew i was not going to be able to complete my mission to save olympia from whomever was staying at la quinta the night before (or was it the same night, i forget) i ran over the snake ("i got snaked!"), but pulled over to the side too soon to notice my front left tire had popped the cops wrestled me to the ground in the middle of the interstate i sat cuffed hard in the back of a car for what seemed to be an hour then i was stuffed in the mental health section of the pierce county jail it was not fun; it was quite sad. they took my clothes, and all i could do in my cell was walk around naked and eat shitty baloney sandwiches so sad i wanted to kill myself. i almost did. they put me in razor cuffs tight with a white bag over my head. if i let the cuffs do their job, i would've been done. i thought everyone had left the jail, and that the end of the world was here (no one would find me) as i inched slowly in the chair with razor cuffs on, by using all muscles i could muster in my 6 pack stomach (zlol), i got 2 toes to touch the bench. telepathically, i picked up that: that was the bet. the dudes who won asked me if i was suicidal.  i said yes because i was scared, and would have rather been anywhere else. so they took me to western state hospital in lakewood. hey, i know lakewood. i know a couple angels of the night there.  i should write about them next time, NOT anyway, the western state mental hospital was almost worse, constant screaming and constant threats from other prisoners that had the same issues as me, but weren't so low key. but at least some of the nurses were incredibly gorgeous and had their shit together.
[hey girls, i'm finding a new psych doc as i type, so don't worry about me. i'm ok, and i'm still on zyprexa and a WAY lower dose of the lamictal that i used to take. thank you for the top notch med management.  oh, and the navos thing was at a different facility. they told me to get a psychiatrist reference from my primary physician, dr bonsack at swedish in west seattle. that's where i'm at with that. oh, and walgreens didn't take my apple care, i had to go to rite aid, which is fine because it's closer to my house. you should be my live in nurse, A. ;)Hey girls another update and more girls, I met at navos inpatient. I'm on the Invega Sustenna shot (2 month dose next time), so I dont have to have pesky pill reminders no more!]
once i got out of that shenanigan, with much help from my mother (god bless you mom), i go to pick up my car at fife towing it looked like a mess with the front tire popped, and other damage i couldn't stomach assessing at that moment. i got my personal belongings, but couldn't find my keys (they only had my one car key) nor iphone 6 (had to order another one from tmobile, that came with ANOTHER free Android). i like Android now that i have a development platform to test skatecreteordie for android with.... i left the car there, in hopes to straighten things out with my insurance and wells fargo dealer services, my lender wells fargo dealer services said they could wait till i had comprehensive on my new progressive plan (i accidentally did liability only when i switched from geico to progressive, because geico got too fucking expensive) they didn't my car is up for auction not sure where yes i care fuck you wells fargo dealer services, fuck you. you probably got a bail out, and were too big to fail at one point too. fuck you

item.title: skiers evolve faster than snowboarders
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
what's the first thing a snowboarder said to a skier? "sorry dude" skier's response "leashes required"

"don't have a leash? tie that rope tow to your ankle so we can see you at all times"

  skiers are better than snowboarders in the perimeter of evolution because they more so use the physically complex dexterity of their feet. similarly, people who dance ballet and ski with equal passion are probably the best at what they do, in terms of speed, swiftness and accuracy of muscle strength into the flow through the smallest coefficient of friction. i'd be willing to bet one would rather watch such a person (equally good at ballet and skiing) at their favorite skill than a snowboarder. in the realm of feet, snowboarders virtually only get to lean back and forth. skiers must orientate their foot dexterity. to snowplow, for example, pushing the big toe of either foot turns the skis, but not both feet at the same time. skiers must bury their ski edges to stand on the side of a hill. snowboarders can only sit on their ass or knees. professional skiers fuck shit up in half pipes and rails; it's way harder to pound two sledgehammers independently (one in each hand), than kick and rotate your ankles a little with both feet moving in parallel. likewise, watching a person really good at roller blading, in a skateboard park, is quite entertaining too, but i'm never going to try it.  it looks way too hard. THEORY: skiing is better cross-training for surfing than snowboarding, but not snow skating.  downhill cross country skiing even more so. snow skating is the best cross trainer on snow for skateboarding.

item.title: A SILVER NIGHT COMET’S DELIGHT. SHINY LOG IN THE SKY THINK I’LL WRITE SOME PINE LAKE DIARIES
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
You were a little shit when you were younger sir jackl
Why don’t you tell them about “shit tag,” little jimmy
---------------------------------------------------------------------
My friends and I were crazy by today’s standards (oh wait
They would not let us even think about going to a normal school
 
We played games like shit tag
Where you rub a stick in a pile of dog shit
And chase your friends with it
 
The thing about shit tag though
Is you HAVE TO play
There is no option not to play
 
Someone rubs shit on you with a stick
And you’re going to want to get them back
 
Or at least someone THAT CAN’T RUN AS FAST
 
You WANT TO BE IT in shit tag
 
One time my friend tripped, and my other red-headed friend was IT
The friend that tripped fell down, and said “time out time out time out”
 
Ruthlessly ecstatic, red head said with gnashing laughter “there IS NO time out in shit tag”
And rubbed the shit up and down his leg
 
“Time out I’m Huuuurt”
 
“There is no timeout in shit tag!!!”
---------------------------------------------------------------------
zlol

item.title: an echo about eccos
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded: i hate shopping, and all the keylime princesses and angels know it takes too damn long, while savings melts in my face the only time i like shopping is when i'm rewarding my kids for hard work in school; when my daughter's shopping forever 21 with only a hundred to break for getting straight A's, again smart girl passed up a pair of john fluvog's for a shopping spree   personally, i'd gladly take the tax spent on that shiny thing for a pack of smokes in desperation, any day   i always bring a list, just in case i can't justify it; stick to the list jimmy, you don't need that pet rock no matter how shiny it looks   all my shit is either a hand me down, once a year gift, or thrift store score looooove the burien and sequim goodwills   so one day, while scribing about jackl at that green stemmed church in copenhagen Church of St Nicholas, i'm pretty sure i sat on a bike rack in the shade sun was hot as fuck, didn't know the sun got that hot and big the shade was comfortably warm and the girl sitting 2 bike racks down from me, frantically arguing over her phone, outside prolly with LG1's human choice of the moment   "his brain is overstimulated again. just sit there. he'll make his move in a sec. especially when i pull on that hair thin silver lined leash. he's a good boy."   it was code for make it fucked up ("spray paint the walls, trash the halls, fuck shit up, do it punk" -calvin)   she saw the frustration on my face as i walked up and sat just down the way because right after mind-bitching the fattie american lookin dude eating ice cream in a pink shirt i looked inside the church, and it was completely empty with no pews huh the fuck? i walked all the way over here for what appears to be the inside of a white monolith?   i WAS ready LG1, For the record, i was ready to pray my heart's content in one of those pews seeing bellevue theater was hard enough that walk (can't remember if this was before. time just kinda sits around in no order when i look back on it)   so i said to myself: "this church better be setup for one of helena's raves, or i'm gonna do some weird shit for giggles from the tourists"   weird shit indeed. i don't have tatoos, but walked in a tattoo shop just a stones throw away and asked about getting a 23 tattooed on my suicide scar (both my kids were born on the 23rd)   i got distracted LG1 was looking at dresses across the street   one sparkled perfection to the vision i had of her one run away karaokeing to chapterhouse, pearl ( https://youtu.be/5PsN_DfnHQU ) LG1 doesn't just appear out of the fucking blue the moments gotta be special the moments gotta be something i might misstep she knows the right time to intervene and / or throw props from god sounds away   dear god that name has significance: pearl i miss pearl the surfer girl best dinner i've ever had at the 5 spot close to the holiday inn express those jock dudes next to us were livid as fuck probably some of your top level hobbyists i'm guessing glad you took 'em for all their worth, after our quaint taint rendezvous and glad i took you to nordstrom's the next day to pay it forward i knew that card would work almost time to break it out again she's (limepink) just gotta trust me more anyway, pearl, we were singing your song in that tattoo shop the same one sung while jogging up hill and that pen you threw in our path a diamond studded pen like the dress LG1 was spotting   i lost my DIAMOND STUDDED pen that day after saying "yes, LG1, that's pretty much your dress" i waltzed down to just another 711 in heaven bitched middle eastern dude out for shitty service, then strolled over to peer into the ecco store cool fucking shoes, but who's the douche with the backpack acting like he owns the fucking store acting like he owns the girl he just walked up to so i walked in don't touch a hair on that angels body mother fucker my shoes ARE tattered and torn from actually walking amazingly walking without my ass on the couch for a change   i was sweating with my attache case and skateboard i needed new shoes anyway, so fuck it cockblocked backpack boy in the middle of the ecco store he was looking around at the most expensive shoes he could find i grabbed the first pair of black kicks that caught my eye   "yeah girl, i'd like to buy these shoes. they're so comfortable i could skate in them. and i will" the first pair she brought fit perfectly had her throw away the shoes i was previously wearing, while scribing as jackl   leave them for the kids a little easter egg gift from the jackl just make sure those interior designers are doing it right inside that church of st nick

it took me a sec to realize i've been building a trap just for them all along. they're more than welcome any time of day; however, when you cross my boundary you cross my boundary. it doesn't take einstein to figure out that i like my house OCD clean at all times, so that i can sit down and function properly behind one of my keyboards, or all of my keyboards.

item.title: neon black
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
there's neon black
could be metal used for attack
or a witch's hail mary sack
darkness
can be a comfort
from poisonous light
muster pain with all your might
release all at once
feel your limbs take flight
you were going down
now you're speeding up
there is no too high
as long as no one notices
you're in front
your strive and masterful upward dive
into the blue beyond
beyond the blackspacehell
there where your haters dwell
showers of sparks emit
from your tips
angels kiss your lips
shapes take form
limbs grow
rivers run
pine needles sparkle
into rivers flow
from an epoch long ice age snow
stomped down and repressed
like coal to coalesce
Anthracite coal crow
unfolds it's long compacted wings
spreading out into dust and black snow
a runaway train's back to life

item.title: Wells Fargo Dlr Svcs, if you're not disabled
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
I did not cancel my policy due to non-payment on 8/16. At the span of time between 8/16 and 8/27 I was deemed gravely disabled by the state of washington for mental health reasons. I was in no condition to keep on my policy, and forced to get a progressive policy when you cancelled mine. I accidentally forgot to get comprehensive and collision, and the lender wells fargo repossessed my car.  My car had personal belongings in it. When i went to get it at the tow yard, it still had clothes, cds, my phone, and a whole key chain in it, that i could not find.  while working on logistics to get my car back, which you were very reluctant to help out with, they took my car before i left the tow yard. Essentially my car was stolen by wells fargo bank, and you did nothing to stop them.  Do I have to be a Government Employee to get decent full coverage insurance from Progressive?  I'm not a Government Employee, is that why my car got taken while I was "gravely disabled" as deemed by the state of Washington. I served roughly 20 days in jail and a mental health facility for having a bipolar disorder manic episode.  Now that I know your insurance doesn't cover bipolar people in crisis, I'm going to be vocal about it.
thank you wells fargo dealer services

tell you what you boys,
you go fuckin with kids under 18, you're gonna get it in jail, no matter what the current legalese says
herein lies the problem with my life
my sport takes me places where there is an overabundance of beautiful young women. when i'm taking part in my sport, it can be a distraction. so what do i do?
much to my mother and daughter's chagrin, i date ladies of the night so i have no reason to be a creep during the day. i take care of and feed my ID so my EGO can just skate, and my SUPER EGO can process business of decency and integrity. part one sub-element of my core.
though these ladies of the night. i don't just see them for the obvious. i treat them like goddesses. i treat them like the wife i don't want to lose. i had my chance decades ago and fucked it up.  i treat these ladies like i don't want to lose them ever, before my hour is up. i buy in extra hours to give them skateboards and take them to the park. i pet their animals and smoke bowls with them. i demonstrate my research to them and send them home with prototypes in hopes they can learn something from me too. i keep in touch and make sure they're ok.
these are not just ladies of the night to me. they are psychotherapists. i see the same ones over and over, not just so i don't have to go out into the wild and look again, but because my favorite psychotherapist moved to brooklyn long ago, and i replaced her with ladies of the night.  they listen to me. they pay attention to my moods because i tell them to. they know me inside and out, and i always encourage feedback from them.
light girl is on the fence about this part of my life, but she plays along anyway, because no one loves me more.  for me, they are her. so we can actually hang out face to face for a change.  usually, with light girl, i'm her and she's me, but occasionally she knows this drives me crazy, and my human half needs a little HUMAN companionship here and there.
before i went to copenhagen there's this girl i literally call light girl. she got me over my fear of dogs and hooks me up with the best weed in the northwest. grown locally, medical grade, legit.
the first time i went to copenhagen she sexted me, out of the fucking blue, and asked me how i was doing. i fell in love immediately and we've been going strong ever since, well strong as long as i need the need or the weed. i got her some shitty dracula candy at a gas station on the way to haderslev streetdome from copenhagen. martin was riding shotgun. good times sugar cookie, good times.
lg's (spirit one) been my guardian angel since i was born. when i was little she was the little boy in my mouth; my imaginary friend.  kinda like danny in the shining.
where was i going with this?  oh yeah, so i'm not a creep by day i pay for psychotherapy by night. it works for me. haven't needed a therapist in several years now. from pearl to holly.
ironically enough holly was the name of my first crush on pine lake. she lived across the lake. i think it was kindergarten or 1st grade. nice girl, and ironically enough a blonde as well. although back then i didn't know what i was in for. i don't think we ever spoke.  she was probably too creeped out because i lived on the third house on the lake, with the first and second house being on the same lake front property: pine lake acres.
not sure how dad scored that one. he was a rocket scientist but still, that house doesn't just go up for sale out of the blue. he must've worked some magic or some shit.  perhaps made a deal with the black aliens, is my latest theory.
i bet holly was scared of the shadows that followed me from my house. my buddy brian and his booger eating little brother lived next door. they were just across from the tadpole / blueberry farm (probably some shitty townhome subdivision / walmart now, but back then there were farms as far as the eye could see. klahanie and sahalie were the wet dreams of pre-microsoft development).
back in the sadler's days.
at the end of spokanimals i talked about splitting, and now we're getting to the point, i promise.
what i didn't tell you at the end of spokanimals is that sugar cookie helped with my split seamlessly, and the result was perfection to our vision.
didn't meet her human form and didn't realize it till now. we didn't sext my second trip to copenhagen.
she knew i was in good hands, and just chilled telepathically while i figured out the connection between her and big k (i'm still struggling with that one, but it'll happen... it's the key to my survival).
human sugar cookie was too busy working on her new duo routine, which i need to re-visit once i figure out the income thing.
space cowboys stole my split from sugar cookie and threw her down. brutal fucking murder. black space hell desecration deals and steals in the name of greed fuckin with me from day one.
fuck you dudes. still fuckin with me. stole my car and still have my keys.
and look what the fuck you did with my split you motherfuckers.
she ain't no strawberry; she's a clone and the real one is in cooooopenhagen. the shit she does she can't feel. you think she's the biggest ho in the world, but she's got the one up on you. she has the ace in the hole.
you guys are so fucking stupid to fuck with her. she fucks you in your dreams like you fuck me in real life. just wait until you see what your wives really look like tonight. you think you're the cat's meow with the hottest wife to make everyone jealous. in reality they're black witches ugly as fuck while she's been tweaking the light for me ... nothing goes unseen space cowboys.
light girl controls all light. unlike a white witch controlling only led light.
go ahead fuck my wife and spank my kids you assholes. stick me in razor cuffs in pierce county. gang rape my ex wife and make me feel so bad i get a stalking charge. i'll use 3rd grade becca's slither sound all i want to clean up your shit
(god damn she scared me even. who's got the white kitten (trust me, i'm still on it omit)).
i will fuck you legally. sugar cookie grounded you. your space dream is a simulation. that little black closet you got hidden in your house to control all your dumb shit is cave man.  you've been fucking with people so long in the name of greed.  do you really think your earth toys mean anything. wrap it up in a mechanical bubble gum and throw it in an avalanche of trees cuz it just don't matter.  your lives don't matter.  black lives matter.
white rose matters.  the last time white rose came over she was so cold from your antics i just pulled her on top of me under covers and held her tight. i didn't even lick her wounds that night. we just held steady. we stayed the course. our love alone will make you feel so bad we won't have to touch you. your own minds will eat you alive. you will have the first suicide by thought. your own thoughts will kill you. meantime, everything will be taken from you like you took everything from me.
you took my split.  your bloody eyed backpacked loser in rainbow crosswalk don't scare me. he tried saying, "oh, she'd look good in a ... " and i was like "fuck n a so would you bro. you know we're on cap hill right?  your ass is just as much in demand as hers"
gay for pay guys for sale
core
this is sugar cookies planet, and when you piss her off, she will destroy it over and over and over and over again. and i keep convincing her over and over and over and over again to keep it around. it's her thesis you dumb asses, and you're fucking around like you're gods because you got the one up on human kind; however, what you don't realize is that you don't have the one up on space kind.
God doesn't have to lift a finger. sugar cookie and i got this handled (God willing, jesus mary and joseph).
thanks for the free training in spokane. now it's your turn. your nightmare is here.
but you've been fucking with me so much, goddess isis had to stop by to see what the fuck.
WHAT THE FUUUUUUUUUUCKKKKKK
keylime (copenhagen hospital light girl with the limegreen headphones connected to an orange case. we've been hanging out all day today. she helped me get my shit back from grounded space cowboys)....
keylime i had to come back to america to fix my split. i know i split her again over and over and over in failed parken, and that's why i was locked up (good thing),
but you gotta know i'm american, and that shit just ain't normal here. my first time in spokane was barbaric.  i thought the tall man was stephan, but i THINK i was wrong. i still don't know who that tall man was. barbaric, though could have just been more FIRST STUDENT training.
just keep running dude, it's cool.  i'm cool running naked in copenhagen right?  like it's cool here right? and again, i just didn't know. how many did you say split out that day? i can't see them, but i have a feeling the technique i've fashioned through empirical research is working pretty well. i can't wait to come back.
skatecreteordie boys, skatecreteordie. if those limbs are buggin ya, i'm sure dr carlson will tighten those screws right down just fine. too tight?  skate it off.
thanks for the iphone back. that saves me $175 from tmobile.
where are my fucking keys?  can't wait to sue wells fargo for illegally reposessing my car when i was up on every payment.
i don't throw shit away, and no cent goes untracked.

item.title: lights clouds action ascension or descension?
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
the date was set
the stage was given
what would he do
make a guess on ascension
waited on him patiently
what would happen
he dove deeper
the hill got steeper
descension
not a trick on his mind
perhaps a test
the blind leading the blind
it took epochs to get out of that mess before
he had reached the oven door
his mistakes were made before
but could he get past
the ink spotted blast
he hadn't seen before
so deep it became
hard to know which way was up
like a surfer in a swirl
underwater rolling around without his girl
the split worked indeed
he had to cut the cord
and quit toying with bleed
though hard to resist
he's legitimately pissed
but does that make it right
to stand up and fight
or just let it go
give into the hands
jesus mary and joseph
he gave into the sands
confession obsession
didn't make it right
he froze out of sight
always a witches delight
but how did they know
his thoughts and detailed flow
he didn't even speak it
for them to see it
poetry or prose
the nail up his nose
he just kept typing
the hammer just kept tapping
while his cat laid napping
he hoped she was right
about the sailor's delight

item.title: i told you so girl
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
i told you girl, and now that i can finally sweep the dirt out from under my toenails and talk to you directly life will be much easier.
my dirtiest darkest secrets are out. there is nothing more to know about me besides the things that have happened to me. not the actions i have orchestrated in darkness. my dark touch. i am not a violent person. you know what i am. i am subtle yet subversive in the efforts of goodness for all man kind. it's a dirty job, but there are a lot of us doing it. including you.
i know you have your work like i have my work. it is work we don't get paid for. we're employed by the many to be the eyes ears nose and mouth of plenty. our sensations are processed by all and all we see is seen at the same time by those in sync with our musical key.
our musical key is silent. they are sounds that titilate the hairs of peoples brains oh so slightly by pushing them from our eyes and tongue into their day and night sleeping consciousnesses.
the first day i saw you was not just love at first sight. it was not obsessive at first sight. actually it was both intensely, now that i'm being honest. but more so it was "oh, there you are" at first sight.
i was so afraid of scaring you away, but it happened inadvertently over something i promised i'd never get with you: jealous.
i hate jealousy. i know you're your own woman, but i want you so bad i've cut myself with the comforts of evil in the world. and boy are they pissed. they didn't think i'd ever pull away. just their for them to prod and sway.
but when your aura took shape in front of me (you once said you can see them very well on your "up adventures"), and i took that one picture of you outside in front of the fire pit with your current lover and best friend, i was stung.
i'm caught in your trap. it wasn't easy. from the first look you had me building it for you. i can't believe i tore that down. over jealousy.
i've been hearing your voice in my thoughts for, again, epochs. but this one is different. i know more. for the things that have happened to me i have learned to process in immediate real time.
i am getting very good at organizing chaos. the chaos that occurs whilest in the presence of a black or white witch.
those witches can be crafty to get what they want out of you. especially if you stay loose.
staying loose is a double edged sword. it lets you get into their minds, but at the same time, they get into your mind too. it's dangerous, but our swiftness and eloquence together can sink ships.
"took down the whole system at the spine with fishing line" -dug
each epoch is only slightly different. though every now and then we'll put a twist in our dance step to switch things up a bit. and hopefully for the better. you dance like dry snow falling on a dry ice floor. your feet don't even need to touch. the opposite magnetic forces of your feet and the ice floor are so polar you are lifted. you know how to tell your body cells to do just the right physics and inertia to keep you afloat when those forces are too weak. i love you, and can survive pits of hunger by thinking about you, and eating our thoughts.
there are no other women. i talk a big game (um that long uncomfortable one i wrote a couple blogs ago (that was hard to write; scary creepy truth is hard to write)). and in reality it's only a defense mechanism. i want to look strong to you. i don't want to look desperate.
yes, beautiful women they are, but they are nowhere near the thoughts i've had with you.
we sat by the fire and doodled from the cross the room. it was just my hand, but you were in it. flowing as if the blood was moving through the molecules of air.
you held my hand from far across the lands, or in this case, mere feet across the wood floor.
no wonder they don't want us to get together. the jealousy they feel over our attraction to each other is staggering.
let's quit wasting time
i have approval from key lime, light girl #1 (me, you get 2 for 1 and if you're attracted to women in anyway, you're stoked), light girl purple, light girl yellow, light girl red, and all those other ladies i talked about a couple blogs ago. each has a unique color.
yes, there is a white rose, and technically white is the presence of all color in light.
there is not yet a black rose. i am core, so i'm most comfortable in the black anyway. light girl pink gave up her color for you. i really liked hot pink as a kid, and still do today.
your color is black with a hot pink hair line. the hair line can wrap around anything in sight, and analyze it's cell molecules in any stage of plight.
it's your ware. the world needs your ware.
we're here to heed their plight. anyone suffering.
your color is all of the above; you are the rainbow
and i'm getting pretty good at building rainbow roads
some day you're just going to appear from around the corner, out of the black and into my warm home of fire.
and i will never tire of the gift of breathing your same air.
i need to see you, even if it's just to see you.
you are not just neon black with a hot pink outline.
you are the rainbow, rainbow girl. everything i've loved about a crush has culminated in you, and your cells are -a- talking to each other in the open air. air is a bunch of cells that move at the speed of thought. i have a feeling that is how universes are created. starbursts from thinking of you.
i promise to help with any plight you have in sight. in fact, i think i can guess some things that are bothering you, but we need to talk subtly more.
i went shopping with your soul the other day while your human half was cursing my name. we bought you a shirt. i think you'll like it, and your boyfriend will most definitely like it. be careful, he might want to wear it, and it would get stretched out.
let's stop wasting time
and if you're not ready, then you are making the world and those other girls very lucky, like your this-many-boyfriends club. so glad i only know about 2. not sure what i'd do if there were more. and i'm not jealous of 1 of them, so there's only 1 i'm jealous of, but he's hella fun too.
there's nothing in our way, and if you're thinking it, it sure isn't me. don't listen and you'll see. i got a package delivery that i worked very hard on today. it took resourcefulness, pain into strength after fighting evil, superglue, recyclable plastic, and a razor blade cutting with such accuracy (at that time you must've been in me).
if you don't turn my way soon, i will be waiting at the next intersection. i know you have a job to do. i know i'm not necessarily in the plans at this point. my life will go on. your life will go on.
and in the end we'll look at each other and say: "i told you so"

item.title: a river runs through it all day long, bitches zlol
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
my father's proudest achievement was our name on the voyager 1 and 2, etched in gold in space. he used gold to control the temperature of the rockets so they did not get too hot nor too cold. that rules. my proudest achievement, after finding out claire and i were expecting out of wedlock (after getting stoned, playing hacky sack all day, and watching days of our lives instead of doing homework. i got one of my Bs for that, that suuuuUUUUUccccccssss zlol),
 
was interning for the state of montana, instead of dishwashing at the windbag hotel (across from the jds cowboy jock bar i used to throw eggs at for waking up jacob).
 
i worked on the first federally certified child support system in the state of montana, the last best place to hide (they took in ted k that year i think. media fucking circus in a town where the only bowling alley was ALWAYS crowded). in the beautiful state of montana, they yank fishing and hunting licenses if you are 6 months in arrears in child support. i know because i designed, developed, maintained and enhanced the trouble ticket tracking system for that state child support system. SEARCHES System For the Enforcement And Recovery of Child Support.
 
i bet you a dollar jase, that you can make someone read this and weap right this moment. 4:20am 20161003
 
https://dphhs.mt.gov/Portals/85/csed/documents/licensesuspension.pdf
 
in effect, i've been a federal employee since 1994.
 
JACOB JAMES ARASIM IS MY PROUDEST ACHIEVEMENT
happy birthday jacob. 22 is a big deal. you made it.
 
you're my proudest achievement JACOB . but kayla gets to be my favorite zlol because that's her thing. 93.3FM all day long. hahahahahaha that makes you my favorite good big brother. you get that birthday present AND good big brother present at the same time this year. i'm moving to the olympic peninsula and retiring on disability and a tiny chunk of land in an airstream (that was my discharge plan at the hospital, and i'm sticking to it, literally. my house is on the market through tobi solvang). you should see the navy ships and the ferry ride to seattle from bremerton. i bet there are orcas all day long.

item.title: the dry effigy
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded: You should have seen it girl. A masterpiece. A beautiful burnless effigy for you. Oh they saw it alright, then I just packed it up and went on my way. I was skating around Copenhagen, because the entire city is a skatepark. And then realized my airBnb hostess was awefully "cackly."  Like a Danish Black Witch that somefuckinghow survived viking mallets and fire. Well, she was a red head, so maybe that helped disguise her while lifting keys telepathetically from the other vikings on skateboards. When MY keys were gone; however, I did not feel like begging for entrance.  My only shit in the place was just some of my shit, and I didn't wanna be a whiny American crying about being locked out of my spot.  That has not fared well for me in the past, even at home, unfortunately. Especially when it's really really easy to be homeless in Copenhagen. The streets are safe as fuck.  People don't carry weapons around and bully you for money, because they don't fucking need to (free healthcare, even for American non-citizens). My favorite place as a child was the cemetary, next to my church in Issaquah, Washington, United States: St Joseph's Church, on the hill (across from the Pine Lake Plateau). After eating really fucking good doughnuts, after surviving another boring ass HOUR of the same readings and gospel every year in church (and praying of course, that someday I could kneel behind a beautiful girl like that, naked), sweet Mary Magdalene led me to the cemetary to play with my smart ass friends, and find creep ass head stones.  The BEST one was the one with a statue concrete hand growing out of the top of it (we should go find that someday after we get married). Naturally I was skating around Copenhagen on LG's street cruiser with grip tape (It was stolen later :( ), and finally found solace in the Copenhagen cemetery. The Copenhagen cemetery was a little tricky to get into from behind, but some dumb ass left the fence broke open.  So I crawled into it, curled up under some trees, leaned against LG's board on the fence, and proceeded to take a little meditative nap.  And ponder why the fuck I heard my recording of you blaring out an apartment window at 4:20AM, when I was skating for you and the Goddess Isis statue (I think it was).  I think it was a Goddess Isis statue. It was a gold ass female head, so I can only guess. But I forgot to read the plaque beneath.  I was too busy doing bonelesses between two trees where a cement gap laid. Then one of those accurate and fast as fuck road bikers stepped behind the fence to take a piss.   I jumped up! Fuck you! Hands white knuckled on my 169 skateboard trucks, ready to clack a biker. "No bikes at the skatepark!" "I'm just taking a piss dude." "Oh word. Hope the sun comes out today. Your bike lanes are badass and everywhere.  You follow the rules of the road extremely well too.  I didn't know there was no free right turn here. Last time I was out in March of '15. Sorry about that!" "Hey kid, enjoy Copenhagen please." So I walked into the cemetery some more, wide awake at the twilight of dawn, found a couple park/cemetery benches and had a seat, to see if my smokes were at least still in my bag (fucking bad witch. i'm not witchist, i just hate assholes). They were!! I lit up, and 3 black witches (nice ones, hot ones, yeah, even the bigger one. and the middle one, the hottest one, was you ;) ) rounded the corner immediately and sat on the bench adjacent to mine and next to the water spicket (ironically enough.  free water for the displaced!). They were still partying into the daylight, because it's just like that there. The hot one, you, handed me a beer and a pack of VERY important wooden matches with some super old school guy's (like 16th century danish hero or something) face and name on it.  I lit up again. 2 smokes at once. They dug that shit, gave me HELLA pro-tips and the Jackl was born. The Jackl is a children's character, climbing through the mud and crust of the earth, for the hell of it, so kids could feel safe these days. Jackl been underground in his head so long he didn't realize how fucked the world had become since he was a kid, and decided to break training. The world is just not normal anymore.  He broke training, for those witches, and for you, right fucking there. The witches nodded and let him skate about his business, right there, in the cemetery. "It's cool dude, we like skaters like greek row jocks in America like tight football player spandex asses, piling on top of each other in some kind of naked pig pile with pussy pads.  Fuck shit up, like when you were an Issaquah Lions line backer back in '85. There was a loooooong stretch of a smoothish, straight path through the cemetery.  At one end was a vampire bench tucked under some pretty green trees.  Alongside the path there was a 10 foot tall hedge (ready for hedge diving and purple motherfuckers, spec). On the other side of the path was the most beautiful landscaped grass that led to various master viking crafted head stones. My FAVORITE was the one someone had planted a pink rose on top of.  The rose looked like it'd just grown fresh out of the headstone, still glistening in the morning dew :), saying "Hello to you, Low Key Jackl." Well well well well girl, fancy meeting you here little flower.... HEY!  I picked up a Dragon Fly sweater shirt for you in the free pile in Wonderland.  I got it right after walking some tight rope thing with these weird, angry dudes.  They smoked me out, but got a little apprehensive when I said I wanted to go swimming in the lake... out to the moonrise island (you've GOT to see it girl. I have a grass patch next to the water waiting for us). "oooo yuck!" the big middle eastern dude said, "There's some gross fucking mud on the bottom."  (was that you spec ? ). I replied, "Oh yeah, Pine Lake had mud on the bottom too. Big deal.  Mud washes off you know. Just watch out for the leeches... especially if you don't have your shaker of salt.  Anyway, I'm used to it. I got this man, you guys don't need to lift a finger.  The old man Jackl kid's got this shit figured out.  I used to dive down to the bottom of Pine Lake, pet crawdads, save them from getting trapped in aluminum cans (everyone littered back then), then came back up with a handful of mud... to throw at my best friends.... riding in our family's yellow Pelican Boat. Good times.  In decades of hindsight, I think that's what got us started playing shit tag (wipe stick in dog shit and rub it on the person you want to be it. There is no timeout in shit tag, cuz you get really fucking pissed with smelly dog shit on your leg, and naturally do not hesitate to get someone back). Ok girl, another thing I'm gonna tell you about that mosquito shirt.  It's LG's shimmering sparkles that make up the mosquito (the one I can't see outside of premonitions... the real one... the one in me that people can sometimes see, I think.. the one that left me the pen of like design... stolen :( ).  The sweater shirt is supposed to be worn mosquito back, but I wore it on the front. "What?! You wore it? Ummmm" The pretty Wonderland girls suggested it, and I did not hesitate.  I didn't want them to think I wouldn't take a dare, for one, and for two, I didn't want to seem uptight. As fun as that little group was, they were a bit extreme for me.  They wanted to walk me to some pirate island or some shit, but I'd been walking with A.C. all morning. Shes actually kind of a big deal there I've found. Asked her to marry me like you and Sugar Cookie. I wasn't joking either. Everyone thinks I am. That's the joke.  Anyway, no news is good news, and no "I'm ok" is not an answer (zlol 2 for 1 :) ). I was like, I'm gonna get a beer and a bowl and skate the new DIY 'crete outside of Ali's. Those DIY Dane's been working hella hard on it, and I gotta pay my respects... shred blood and tears respect. I needed to get hurt on it at least once. I did not follow them and I never saw them again.  They gave me the weirdest look and laughed a little, like I'd passed up the opportunity of a life time.  I didn't. Hanging out in Wonderland IS the opportunity of a lifetime.   And I think they were up to nefarius shit. And I just wasn't down to fucking clown around. Fuck that.  I was on "vacation" to get away from that shiiizzzzzz. Remember the guy I stared down in "Shimmering tale of the other side of defeat?"  I found his fucking head stone, but I don't know who the fuck he is, because there was no God damned etching or semblance of a name, date, nor anything on it. To me it read "This dude is finally dead, so please don't fuck with this." I'm good at boundaries though, and I wanted to fuck the unknown fucko... BAD! UT fucking P I got on Holly's board and started rolling around non-chalantly.  Then I got Roxhill on nameless dude's ass.  I did the trick I invented: the Punk Rock. Essentially it's when I do a flat ground power slide into walls... and BONK my tail and sometimes nose on the wall.  I didn't hit the tombstone, my board stopped short in the slightly torn grass, at the foot of the tombstone.  LG thumped my board in air for me for effect. "Ok jackl, that's enough" When LG tells me that's enough, I usually hesitate (the wrong thing to do), then she says it again, "Really, that's more than enough."  I got scared and decided to do something for you, girl, on the other side by the Vampire Den. Because I love you to no end, I built a DRY effigy; An abstinent ghost girl effigy. There was a newly planted tree.  I draped the mosquito shirt over it, dressed it with flowers, added a Kemp jersey my Native American friend Nick gave me from Boise, and did some other stuff.  I forget what, but was thinking.  I needed some serious Native American help with the faceless head stone guy. So I skated while a few gay vampires watched. The vampires were stoked about walking in the daylight per the Ballard Condo furniture toss of 2006 (good one dudes, that shit did stink. We caught hell for that, but it was not worth it anyway. Regardless, I'll just do it smarter next time, and know that those cops were FAKE). You made me take off my shirt in the sun to give them a show. They liked that.  I liked they liked that, and just made me love you more. You don't judge, and you're a highly intelligent young woman.  Quite the combo. I've been sold a long time.... Yeah, I'm gay girl, sorry zlol j/k. I did not burn the effigy. Fuck no. I packed up your shirt and left it at that.  It was too perfect.  The Vampire guys were like, "we can take it from here :) " Thank God; Thank LG; Keep earth!!! I checked out the cemetery some more.  Families and kids started coming out of the woodwork (glad I put my shirt back on, glad I folded your mosquito sweater, took it home, and gave it to you. That was fun. The witches wooden matches sure did come in handy later that day (Spec knows), and the faceless tombstone follows me to this day. Get in line fucko, get in line.  I got business to take care of.  Afterall, I'm "Gravely Disabled" and blind as a bat. zlol

item.title: haunted abildgaards ... tricksters
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
i first saw you july 2015 pursued Mary Magdalene. A beautiful choice, Helena, but not the girl i was necessarily aiming for. you little girl, are joan of arc. no not you either abigaard kat.... you belong with abigaard ashley in christianborg castle. ms. arc has been hitching rides with your souls bodies for some time, and decided to pursue little old me, jimmy. must have something to do with my being the last arasim born on pine lake, and having done many 2.3 mile runs at pine lake middle school, where nothing has changed, but the sea of strip malls and board and scared to death sandies. you think theres something in that lake eh?  little jimmy hasn't been diving down to shove his feet in the mudd lately, but there's another couple things you should know first.
  1. no one from pine lake knows anyone from bever lake.
  2. something is fuct with lake samammish.
solution 1. jimmy should hang out with nicole peart some more, as she's from beaver lake, virginia mason, or just skip rocks there with ms. arc. solution 2. quit letting motor boats on lake samammish god damn it! it's a fresh water lake. yes the samammish sleu connects it to lake washington; however, lake washington is only allowed to get a little salty from the ballard locks off the canals of lake union. get it? i have a feeling your from around here ms human arc 2016 (amy). perhaps you swam out of beaver lake depths to see if i was really still alive, with nikki peart. darling nikki and joan of arc with a heart.  christmas couldn't have come any sooner i guess. gonna hit goodwill on dearborn, and find me a beauty christmas sweater vest. you say amy i say joan you woke me up from being a tool flying bone i walk and talk i relax and sauce no method no madness just never wrong i cannot tell a lie never been attracted to a short haired tom boy but your brain shines true i love you for you you serve man kind with a smile on your face with frames on your glaze but you're still just the same your aura ain't a game telling me what to do i'm on the path never will i yell at you kiss is fog too this kiss is for you. amy her autumn swept brushless hair smacked my face for the last time not "shut the fuck up" just "wake the fuck up" so i did i'm in pursuit i'm in the hot pursuit for the lone psycho no, not norman bates norman bates masturbates so does his mom psycho witch abducted his sister too from bever lake i suppose i need a smoke in front of the Gull issaquah wa 1984 to see what's in store bitch aint no core but the core choked up the bitch I LOVE YOU JOAN OF ARC. WILL YOU BE MINE? no, well ok then. let me approach your big sister the vandal. have you heard of the vandals? not the idaho vandals, the ballard vandals. the ballard vandals are led by my big K, and i figured out the tattoo i'm going to get over my suicide scar: HELENA rebecca, where the fuck did you go after our rendezvous in Paris?  i had a hell of a time getting home, and a hell of a time trying to stand on my own tow feet ever since.  i don't care if you're my half sister through our moms and wayne.  the torch i carry for you burns through every pretty girl i've licked clean. i want to lick you clean for a change. i have  since 8th gfucking grqnde. just ask lisa o. , meg k. , katie k. , monica c.,  jessie t. , sheri s. , inga h., holly r., janice, katrina h's young friend, molly g. , christina e., emma a, etc. oh yeah, fun prom date becca, spaz, thanks for inviting me to your mike cheezemiller coked up hot tub gang bang after the dance. no thanks!  i want you to my own.  i want your hand. i want your offspring. if you're already pregnant, i want your baby to raise with you. does that make sense?  is that position vacant or what?   girls. i'm a boy.

item.title: Dear Ashley Abildgaard
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ashley Abildgaard,
the Talarico's waitress / Red Lion Hostess,
No, I do not want to watch COPS from my hospital bed again tonight.
My head still hertz from the Angry Orchard you served me the other night at Talarico's.
Fuck your Wilson Wannabe Wigger friend.
I'll never eat there again.
Although I am still willing to sit and smoke at Blonde Emma's Velvety Foam Cafe, and Maybe some pie ala mode later, but only with you, Ashley Abildgaard.
I can't believe it's been 12 years (2004-2016) since we split at that Red Lion Inn in Spokane Washington. My how time flies.
That must be the significance of the 12 pointed ring I threw at Kat to save her from Satan's grip that one night several moons ago.
She must be doing ok as I haven't heard from her.
Hopefully she found some new friends and a home to live in, instead of heroin needle el corazon dirty wet tent parties on the side of interstate 5 south.
fuck that venue.
offramps in seattle should never be closed.
and you can take that tip as well, arboretum bridge to nowhere. dont leave me, or i may never jump naked at night again.
Ashley, you look a lot like a cross between JLAW and Reagan from the Exorcist II. I don't know what turns me on more: your beautiful smile, or the fact you can render sludge creeps scared shitless in a neon black witch's half heart beat... turning your head around like an owl 'n shit.
that's a pretty rad trick girl.
i love you.
you're hired (so are you JLAW).
i.e. go ahead and join my line of mormon wives, and we'll worry about the details when our job is through.
we have to scare seattle's new tunnel into either a massively cool underground aquarium, or just fill it with pure concrete granite to reinforce the epochs of demonistic native indian graveyards it displaced after seattle burned down the last time.
not to mention the triggers of trigger happy fissures riddled throughout the Puget Sound.
If they bore that thing another inch towards the shanty cafe, our entire planet is going to look like pac man, and we'll have to terraform mars out of necessity (without digging).
love,
jim
p.s. dont dig jupiter either. interrupting the largest mass in a gravity held solar system is a bad idea, hal9000. change your fucking battery already. i'd recommend duracell, energizer, or kirkland signature.

item.title: punk rock
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
it happened one day
in a land far away
in a cemetaray
i met 3 witches
got wood matches
staged a burnless effigy
and skateboarded for thee masses
underground of coarase
i was alone
the witches had since roamed
just me
and a faceless tomb stone
"who the fuck are you?"
we both bellowed
i skated to its edge
skidded the grass
but didn't touch
faceless tomb man's hedge
that one day
i felt
i'd beaten father time
while respecting both his boundary
and mine

item.title: notstafia helsingor
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
never been there
never thought i wood
but i was hungry
and its cafe was closest
to the hood where i stood
helsingor
oh helsingor castle
no i haven't read hamlet
but my son loves shakesphere
which makes me
something of a prequel legacy
as i sipped a latte through
your tour, marveled at the
cathedral that wouldn't
burn in the 16th centrury
i noticed someone had quadroned
off some shitty modern conference room
"do not enter"
i ignored
and as i peered inside
i found a spiral staircase
... gone underground ...
so i just took a digital picture
and got the fuck out
one day i'll return
and i bet
my vampirish lover from '76 will be
waiting there in our wings
<:|>

item.title: you wanna watch COPS?
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded: A girl i consider my daughter watched my house for the summer while i chilled in copenhagen denmark mental institutions and with magnus and she left me a cake with some wicked bad frosting made of lard and sugar i ate the frosting first quit my useless american job then lived off the chocolate cake part after   she left the remaining betty crocker frosting in my cupboard, because, like my earth conscious daughter she's not a wasteful person   after spending all but my last 20 cents i lived off licks of that frosting and free tea from a dude us core locals call the machine ... until i discovered the food bank   one night, trying to meet ashley abildgaard for another bottle of angry orchard and pizza on my credit card at a shit biting pizza joint in west seattletard some four eyed pussy in a wilson jersey took it from me before i could even take a bite of cheesy apple goodneess wicked jealous little kkkunt!   a few nights later i returned like a gator with the lard to west seattletard for ashley abildgaard   blonde velvety foam emma gave me a free gluton free bar and after i wolfed it down i put on a frown and waltzed straight to the back of that pizza joint's retard-a-bar   in the bathroom while pissing i wrote in betty crocker lard glistening fuck you and your nerdy glasses wilson wannabe wiggard!   the bouncers beat me (at least they tried really hard) then stepped on my head till the cops showed up instead and put me on the hood of their car   till the looney truck took me to virginia mason where "nurse josh" stuck a catheter up my johnson for a quick 'n dirty urine sample   clean and left for dead all night i struggled against sleep strapped to a gurney under heavy guard   an angel nicole peart showed up in the morning found me unarmed naked and chill strapped to the gurney still   pulled her angel strings got me a cozy room in the sky west wing ordered room service adjusted my sleep number bed unarmed   less restraints turned on my personal big screen tv and straight faced with the CUTEST silent smirk in the world asked   "you wanna watch COPS?"    i think she was from beaver lake i'm from pine lake nicole.  i owe you some jewelry and a dozen white roses, plus one red and one blue :) amen vagina mason, amen

item.title: christmas eve eve trickster
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
cool party but think i'll have a smoke
outdoor trickster in the shadows
i'll call her jenny, she calls me forrest
are you kidding me, we need more us
when your tongues move my lips
i laugh harder in the hips
harder than the color purple
harder than i did with my bro hurkle
tell me this trickster girl
i'll call you jen
i want your hen
give me music on my lips in a swirl
a car is coming
work hard
lurk hard
er
they think you're a ghost
not so mam
check out my black camo outfit
though my name sure the fuck aint sam
well it's sam they think you are
being in this alley
under a sky without a star
you know what that means
corrupted space cowboys are up to their schemes
again
my friend
mixing combinations and sticking them in the blend
when you tongues hit my lips jen
you are the law
calling me a trickster
rubs my gut raw
with laughter
and then after
we tuck in the shadows
no, not the buffalo bill tuck
get your mind out of my gutter
friends think lunacy is milking my cow's utter
gross
well i had to rhyme
next time do it on time
ok then, jen
what did you want to say
when your spirit moves my lips
to a silent utter
there is barely a sputter
of laughter
what do you think of that the day after?
girl
don't swirl
i see your teeth listening
i hear your voice glistening
you already used that rhyme
is that such a crime
kinda like
don't look so hollow
no one can see your shadow
"you're wearing all black!"
"zlolz no one can see shit anyway"
"what are you hiding from"
perhaps it's myself
i put my board on the shelf
but now i'm ready to kill it
just like when you poke your face
at a loud shrill screaming popped zit
zlolz

item.title: seattle somber christmas
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
bite ass cold cracks dawn
they're killing deer with cars on vashon
the icy asphalt potholes crack into tires
warm and safe at home
people lucky enough to be inside
warm by the fires
unless you smoke
then walk 25 feet away
and choke
cynical media flames the online stage
people just doing their jobs on tv
started this nuclear war rage
this one goes out to the troops
overseas
in dust and sand
thinking we're one big party
in the states
but we're not
we're cleaning up the scraps
left from the greediness
of the usa
got a job
ok
we'll stop the mob
maybe i should watch
woodie guthrie some more
to learn
for what this country has in store

item.title: last christmas
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
tropical coconut beach balm
grasp christmas in your palm
that was my earliest memory
of waterworks park issaquah and george michael melodies
big ass sweatshirts
generra zebra club and fancy new ford escorts
tell me he's in a better place
could've used his brain to finish this race
before starbucks were just coffee carts
outside on seattle sidewalks
blaring wham on mini stereo starts
ghetto blasters and break dancin' talks
george and andrew blazed the charts

item.title: post Christmas holly
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
stars line the midnight sky purple pens catch my eye
your online glare
could catch anyone with a snare
hot as fuck
just don't make them cry
post christmas holly runs dry
garbage lines the morning sky
sitting where i don't know why
a strange nightmare caught my sleeping eye

item.title: pine lake diary winter storm
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
pine acres
that's what they say
our iron rod gate paved the way
for scared cows out of their hay
lightening struck purple
and the blizzard was furious
my dad called out
let's hurry us
to find our cows
outside their electric pen
and into our yard
without stomping on a hen
(that was the raccoon's job)
let's form a mob
and search for our cows
in this blizzard
they broke out of their electric fence
like a wizard
but when found
it was way to late
our cows could no longer mate
they were broken battered and bruised
from the dogs fucking with them
bloody scar patched and woozed
tootsie and roll were there names
at any country fair they'd see their share of dames
but these were now dead meat
milking cows shouldn't milk blood
that's not very neat
so dad took them for a field trip
away from their freezing electric shelter
to a new one
but after the melter
in our fridge then than sat
in separate packages
labeled "tootsie" and "roll"
with permanent ink
forever since childhood
over that
my heart's been in a sink

item.title: haunted house on pine lake
item.dc:creator: jaemzware
item.content:encoded:
the bonfire charred the front yard
hallways lined with dark scars
the crawlspaces behind hid the shadows
of ghosts from gruesome pasts before
we crawled back there like the kids we were
where gerbils escaped
only to eat their young
as the attic space door crept open
the boy covered his face with his favorite blankie
please go away
should i cry i'll get another spankie
a bloodish smear streamed his wall the following morning
gather brush for the next burning
the garage next door
once upon a time
was not a garage at all
but another house
that didn't win out
piled with junk and dust from failed christmases past
the boy crawled through that junk as well
birdie nets and kayaks that hadn't been used for years
the ghosts of his home next door crafted new jears
for the following night
"he'll be alone, a latch key kid, we'll give him new fright"
back in those days
the exorcist played
on public tv
the kid watched, thought he was brave
just cuz he saw rosemary's baby at a much younger age
(that baby was so fakie, how scary can it be)
the nights blackness inevitably crept over
and the show was still on
as her head spun on end, so did his
and realized, every light in his haunted house was still on
he ran to the darkest corner to get the worst fear out first, and find the light
the closet with a shelf no one ever bothered to reach
dust an inch thick with rat shit strewn over an empty streak
the metallic balled light switch string pulled
only to hear a pop
flash blind with exorcist on his mind
"see what you've done?"
(wanna watch starblazers?)
and he thought he couldn't see before
fall to the floor
which ghost would stab him in the heart
with the fireplace poker
and sit him on the gold svelt mushroom crusted couch
only to see
his charbroiled chimney mysteriously lit with fire
he was home alone
it wasn't a gas switch
so he proceeded to light every switch in the house
that only made it scarier
now he could see
every smudge and imperfection
made by unhuman hands
unseen by daylights neglection
